details:
noun
- something that remunerates
= synonyms: remuneration
verb
- dedicate
= synonyms: give
- bear a cost or penalty, in recompense for some action
= example: bear a cost or penalty, in recompense for some action
- convey, as of a compliment, regards, attention, etc.
= synonyms: give
- give money, usually in exchange for goods or services
- cancel or discharge a debt
= example: cancel or discharge a debt
= synonyms: pay up, ante up
- discharge or settle
= example: discharge or settle
- do or give something to somebody in return
= example: do or give something to somebody in return
= synonyms: make up, pay off, compensate
- bring in
= synonyms: yield
- make a compensation for
- render
= example: render
- be worth it
= example: be worth it
